paragraphs: I specialize in creating responsive websites using the latest technologies.
My passion for delivering the best lies in creating cutting-edge designs that provide a seamless user experience by adding my own touch that takes the project to the next level.

quotes.text: When you love what you do, you excel at it.
Programming is the closest thing we have to magic.
Simplicity is the soul of efficiency.
Code is my space, logic is my color.

projects.name: Esnad Takaful
projects.description: A website that helps promote health.
projects.techStack: C#, HTML, CSS, JS and others
projects.details: The BeSure app has been carefully designed and implemented to be a trusted reference, providing step-by-step guidance and aiming to revolutionize the way people manage their health through a broad health network.

projects.name: Learning Management System (LMS)
projects.description: A website that helps teachers make their work easier.
projects.techStack: PHP, Blade(HTML + Blade Syntax), CSS, JS and others
projects.details: This project aims to manage teachers' work by providing a place where they can view their courses, add and reuse posts, add assignments, add tests... especially access their old courses and more.

projects.name: Efficient Linux Log Management
projects.description: Overcome manual log analysis with Manticore search and Logstash for quick analysis.
projects.techStack: Logstash, ManticoreSearch, PHP, HTML, CSS, JS and others
projects.details: This project aims to address this challenge by developing a powerful log search and analysis engine that leverages Manticore Search and Logstash. This automated system unifies logs, ensures real-time updates, and provides powerful search capabilities, making log management efficient and actionable.

resources.title: Time taken using the automated system
